paragraph.paragraph: This cluster contains all the dialogs provided by Vision2.
paragraph.heading: 2Standard dialogs
paragraph.paragraph:
A standard dialog provides a way of interacting with the underlying platform (such as Windows or Linux) to perform basic tasks such as opening a file or printing a document. Vision2 provides six dialogs that allow the user to perform everyday tasks that are
../../../reference/ev_color_dialog_chart.xml EV_COLOR_DIALOG -- This allows the user of your app to select an RGB color (useful for graphical apps such as a Paint Program).
../../../reference/ev_directory_dialog_chart.xml EV_DIRECTORY_DIALOG -- This allows the user of your app to select a directory.
../../../reference/ev_file_open_dialog_chart.xml EV_FILE_OPEN_DIALOG -- This allows the user of your app to select a file to be opened.
../../../reference/ev_file_save_dialog_chart.xml EV_FILE_SAVE_DIALOG -- This allows the user of your app to select a filename that will be used for the creation of a file.
../../../reference/ev_font_dialog_chart.xml EV_FONT_DIALOG -- This allows the user of your app to select a font (useful for a Word Processor for example).
../../../reference/ev_print_dialog_chart.xml EV_PRINT_DIALOG -- This allows the user of your app to choose printer settings may be used in conjunction with
../../../reference/ev_print_projector_chart.xml EV_PRINT_PROJECTOR .
paragraph.heading: 2Creating custom dialogs
paragraph.paragraph:
If you wish to provide a custom dialog in your application,
../../../reference/ev_dialog_chart.xml EV_DIALOG has been provided to facilitate this.
paragraph.heading: 2Message dialogs
paragraph.paragraph: A message dialog gives your application a standard way of displaying useful (or vital) information, this information can be displayed with the following message dialogs.

list.item: ../../../reference/ev_message_dialog_chart.xml EV_MESSAGE_DIALOG -- Allows a simple message to be displayed to the user.
../../../reference/ev_information_dialog_chart.xml EV_INFORMATION_DIALOG -- Allows useful info to be displayed to the user.
../../../reference/ev_question_dialog_chart.xml EV_QUESTION_DIALOG -- Allows the user to respond to a question with Yes or No.
../../../reference/ev_warning_dialog_chart.xml EV_WARNING_DIALOG -- Allows a warning to be displayed to the user.
../../../reference/ev_confirmation_dialog_chart.xml EV_CONFIRMATION_DIALOG -- Allows the user to confirm an action that has been requested.
../../../reference/ev_error_dialog_chart.xml EV_ERROR_DIALOG -- Allows an error message to be shown to the user.
